item.title: Brain Scan books over at Cruxy
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: First off, welcome to the New Year. Hopefully everyone had fun, and got exactly what they wanted over the holidays. So what does 2008 bring? Well Brain Scan is proud to announce that you'll be able to pick up our books (not all of them are up yet, but they will be soon) over at Cruxy in DRM free PDF format! Hooray! All of our books will be a fat $0.72 each big or small. Fill up that Kindle you got with some comic goodness!
